title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1640-10.2 - Bonding of officers and employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1640-10.2 - Bonding of officers and employees

State Regulations

The attention of local agencies is called to the
standard provision in contracts for State aid requiring local agencies to
obtain fidelity bonds covering its officers, agents or employees. The
division's requirements for fidelity bond coverage are contained in Part 1630
of this Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1640-10.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
